General.Name: M.R.M. SA
General.Description: MRM is a listed real estate investment company that owns and manages a portfolio of retail properties across several regions of France. Its majority shareholder is SCOR SE, which owns 56.63% of its share capital. MRM is listed on Compartment C of Euronext Paris (ISIN: FR00140085W6 - Bloomberg code: MRM:FP " Reuters code: MRM.PA). MRM opted for SIIC status on 1 January 2008.

3.Name: Mr. Harsh  Kapadia
3.Title: Exec. VP and Chief Creative Officer - New York & Princeton
